title: Writing on the Wall
description: After a young girl named Trisha discovers an old message on her closet wall written by a mysterious MJ, she begins a journey to discover who wrote the message and what it means. Writing on the Wall is an engaging story that combines history with mystery, and it will keep students interested until they discover the identity of MJ. The book can also be used to teach students how to sequence events as well as how to connect to prior knowledge to better understand a text.
highFrequencyWords: borough, bustling, census, convince, enlisted, immigrated, renovating, research, somber
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
